Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2011...
Injured on 6/22/2011 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/2012...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 3/2/2012 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/4/2013 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/19/2016 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Traded from New York (A) to San Diego on 3/2/2017 (Going to SDN: SS D. Robertson, P M. Fulmer, C T. Joseph, LF S. Gutierrez. Going to NYA: P W. Davis, P G. Casiano, C M. Kamps)...
Released by San Diego on 6/30/2020...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 6/30/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 7/8/2020...
Had first career hit on 6/12/2021, off Paul Clemens (PHI)...
